Html:
Hi,

i just noticed that the WPP Console not showing all PC's thats shown in the WSUS, and i cant see the reason why. Ive tried to find the missing one with the filter option without any result. I am not filtering the offline pc's.
In WSUS-Console you see all clients? Including missing Clients in WPP-Console?

Hi,

its a little bit strange. On the next day the missing pc was showing in the WPP-Console. But now, i am missing that client in the WPP and WSUS Console...ive asked our customer already what happen to that client, but got no respons yet.
Try Methode 1 on the effected Client: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/903262
